title: Divine Knockout (DKO) - Ultimate Edition
description: Looking for the Ultimate DKO experience? You’re in the right place.
longDescription:
# Looking for the Ultimate DKO experience? You’re in the right place.

KO the gods in the world’s only 3rd-person platform fighter! Become a small-but-mighty god of myth, brawl in all three dimensions, and knock your friends off the map to reign supreme.

Go Ultimate to start with even more Gods and incredible cosmetics, including the Epic Darkheart Athena skin – exclusive to this Edition. Plus: You'll get 1,000 Runes!

# The Ultimate Edition includes:
- The full game (all maps and modes)
- 8 Gods (Amaterasu, Sol, Hercules, Susano, Ymir, Athena, Thor, and King Arthur)
- 4 God Tokens (Used to unlock any God of your choice in DKO)
- The Epic Biohazard Sol Skin AND the Epic Darkheart Athena Skin
- 1,000 Runes
- “The Ultimate” Title
- A DKO Founder Emote and Avatar
- King Me Crater Decal
- The Founders Profile Card

# Additionally, you’ll receive a special bonus in SMITE*
- Stormy Chibi Susano Skin
- The God Susano, and his Voice Pack

* Only usable on the platform where you purchase this Edition
technicalDetails: Do NOT stack Standard Founders Pack audience under this; Hi-rez has already included the standard content within the ultimate pack.
